channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell Client Platform BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell Client Platform BIOS

item.title: CVE-2024-39584|2024-08-28T14:15:01.978Z -- dell -- dell%20client%20platform%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains a Use of Default Cryptographic Key Vulnerability. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Secure Boot bypass and arbitrary code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-38483|2024-08-15T14:24:22.170Z -- dell -- dell%20client%20platform%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-38483|2024-08-14T09:24:10.775Z -- dell -- dell%20client%20platform%20bios
item.description: Dell BIOS contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability in an externally developed component. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Code execution.

item.title: CVE-2024-39584|2024-08-28T05:46:40.013Z -- dell -- dell%20client%20platform%20bios
item.description: Dell Client Platform BIOS contains a Use of Default Cryptographic Key Vulnerability. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Secure Boot bypass and arbitrary code execution.
